snippet.title: Outrunner: Neon Nights — Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Whishlist Outrunner: Neon Nights now on steam
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1439980/?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=video&utm_medium=social&utm_content=trailer1

Outrunner: Neon Nights merges arcade racing with snake-style mechanics. Race, jump, and defy gravity as you outsmart your opponents. Whether you prefer intense one-on-one duels or chaotic multiplayer mayhem, you can join the neon-lit arenas online with up to 8 players.

Defy gravity
Experience the thrill of defying gravity as you race through futuristic landscapes in Outrunner: Neon Nights. Perform wild jumps and navigate mind-bending environments where gravity is no longer bound to a single direction.

Outsmart your opponents
Compete against friends or players worldwide in intense online multiplayer races. Use your skills and strategy to outmaneuver opponents and claim victory on the digital racetracks.

Online Multiplayer & Local Split screen
Gather a friend for local split-screen multiplayer and enjoy competitive races on a single screen. Experience the joy of friendly competition and see who will be the local champion.
